## Matrix4x4.setNearFar() method

Set the near clip plane and far clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNearFar(znear: number, zfar: number): this;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

The near clip plane.

<tr><td>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The far clip plane.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this

self

## Remarks

This method assumes that the matrix is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
